mapper.select: select grade from users where username=#{username}
select username from usergrade where username=#{username}
mapper.insert: create table ${username}_reviews ( productnum varchar2(50) primary key, content varchar2(4000) not null, imagecount number default 0, stars number default 5, regdate date default sysdate)
create table ${username}_mypage ( username varchar2(50) not null, productnum varchar2(50), wishstatus number not null)

create table ${username}_payment ( username varchar2(50) not null, price number not null, totalprice number not null, productnum varchar2(50) not null, address varchar2(1000) not null, count number not null, orderdate date default sysdate, payment number not null, phone varchar2(50) not null)
mapper.update: update userdetails set image=#{image}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, updatedate=sysdate where username=#{username}
update users set password=#{password} where username=#{username}
